title: UI / UX Designer
subtitle: The User Experience Designer position exists to create compelling and digital user experience through excellent design...

details.overview: We believe that design (and you) will be critical to the company's success...
description: 3+ years working as a product designer.
A portfolio that highlights your approach to problem solving, as well as your skills in UI.
Experience conducting research and building out smooth flows.
Excellent communication skills with a well-defined design process.
Familiarity with design tools like Sketch and Figma
Up-level our overall design and bring consistency to end-user facing properties

title: Web Developer
subtitle: Building dynamic, user-friendly web experiences with clean code, seamless functionality, and a focus on performance, accessibility, and responsiveness.

details.overview: Join our team to shape innovative products with a focus on user-centered design.
